channel.title: Funny PM's
channel.description:
Well, i want to know, ever had a message in your Inbox that you just had nothing to say back? Today i had this: [img]http://i46.tinypic.com/208ilxk.png[/img]
I just didn't know what to say. It is now my signature. Now i ask you to post some pics or a short description of what the message was that just rendered you speechless.

item.title: Funny PM's
item.dc:creator: @P_I_M_P_3_D_Tut `Lewk_
item.description:
@P_I_M_P_3_D_Tut wrote:

[quote=“Fat Cookies, post:18, topic:331532”]http://fpspro.net/images/epicthreads/funniestpmever.PNG
The ultimate pm.[/quote]
so…
much…
win…

Read full topic

item.title: Funny PM's
item.dc:creator: @Jamie1200 Jamie1200
item.description:
@Jamie1200 wrote:

CoonHunter:

Well at least the topic took-off. Lol’d at some of them. Just remember everybody, we all have different opinions about what is funny or not, so dont go ‘ragging’ on the topic just because you think its PM for a reason. Some are funny.

I wonder who that was aimed at…
They aren’t funny. Funny makes you laugh these make me cringe.

Read full topic

item.title: Funny PM's
item.dc:creator: @Acrodox Acrodox
item.description:
@Acrodox wrote:

CoonHunter:

Lol, well im just waiting for a response, i had messaged the kid telling him to do his research, and he has been online since. Wondering when ill get my answer. Maybe this time ill be a gay racist bastard? Rofl

Not trying to be racist or anything coonhunter, but ur names pretty cool, REALLY unique and hilarious all at the same time.

Read full topic

item.description:

[/quote][/quote]

Incest…

item.title: Funny PM's
item.dc:creator: @doom_j doom_j
item.description:
@doom_j wrote:

[quote=“krackkid, post:12, topic:331532”][quote author=The Reaper X link=topic=427912.msg3142161#msg3142161 date=1267671495]

[quote author=krackkid link=topic=427912.msg3142159#msg3142159 date=1267671409]

PMs are meant to be private. That’s how you keep mature arguments, rather than spreading them throughout the public as if this were a middle school hallway.

Middle school? Who is in middle school I was thinking we all are still in elementary O.o.
[/quote]I’ve never heard of drama and shit talking in elementary school.

Then you do not live where I do, thats for damn sure <3, but how about highschool then mate?
[/quote]Most of the high schoolers where I live don’t care enough to waste their time on such antics anymore.

O.o wow lol. My kiddy school has fights about who has more porn on there computers… middle school fights about who has more friends, who is “cool?”, and who saw what show, high schoolers fight about anything.[/quote]

Lol…

In high school people are more mature, because if they mess up they lose everything they could get.

Read full topic

This, makes the internet fun.
